The beautiful thing about hiking is that it is truly an activity everyone can do. Whether you are young or old, an expert or an amateur, there is a trail out there that will be perfect for you. So the next time you are pondering an outdoor adventure
Life is short, buy the motorcycle, have a ride, live your dreams. You do not stop riding when you get old
Run with your heart, leave your worries behind. No excuses, just run. Run with purpose, run with pride. Embrace the sweat, embrace the run. Run because you can.
